title: Flower Road (꽃 길)
lyrics: Bài soạn ở . Tông gốc E, capo 4 Yeah~ ohh, Yeah~ ehh, Oh hoh~ oh hoh Yeah~ ohh, Yeah~ ehh geuttaen cham johassneunde maliya neowa hamkkehal suman issdamyeon ttaelon oelobgo seulpeodo maliya neowa gati hal suman issdamyeon Sing it na na na nolaehae nanana uri ige majimagi aniya budi tto mannayo kkochi pimyeon ttaelon kkwae byeolnan ili manha neon na ga ti mosnan nomeul manna dasi nugungal salanghal su isseulkka? neo ani ramyeon geuleol ileun eobseul geos gata na uisig eobsi balgil heuleumdaelo gadeon gil nal hwa ryeohi bichwojudeon ne bich hanjulgi geu jeonyuli neukkyeojineun yeppeun kkoch gil geugose neolo inhae seolsu issdeon Roly poly toy tteonalyeogeo deun bonae deulioli da nimi gasineun gil le kkocheul ppulioli da a a geuri wo jimyeon dorawa jwoyo geuttae tto dasi nal saranghaejwo yo i kkoch gil ttala jam si swieo gadaga yeah geu jali geu goseseo nal gidaryeo yo geuttaen cham johassneunde maliya neowa hamkkehal suman issdamyeon ttaelon woelobgo seulpeodo maliya neowa gati hal suman issdamyeon manhi ulgido haessjiman useun ildo manha nae meo rissog aneneun chueogi neomu manha i tto han jinagal tenikka i daeu me mannayo kkochi pimyeon il nyeon sambaek duksibo i sesang hanappunin neon nae eumagui motive nal ilkkaewojuneun eunin ne keodalan kkochbate gidaeeo mag tteooleudeon gasa mal neolan mangae han kkochui saegeun sibman gae mu handae geodaehan ullim vivaldiui sagye a jigdo geudaen nae mame dameul su eobsneun grim nae nuneul uisimhaji You are my magical queen tteonalyeogeo deun bonae deulioli da nimi gasineun gil le kkocheul ppulioli da a a geuri wo jimyeon dorawa jwoyo geuttae tto dasi nal saranghaejwo yo i kkoch gil ttala jam si swieo gadaga yeah geu jali geu goseseo nal gidaryeo yo kkoch ip ttada i beul majchujyo eol guleun ppalgaeji go kkoch gileul kkala jun bileul hajyo geu daega osineun gil geuri wo jimyeon dorawa jwoyo geuttae tto dasi nal saranghaejwo yo i kkoch gil ttala jam si swieo gadaga yeah geu jali geu goseseo nal gidaryeo yo kkoch ip ttada i beul maj chujyo eol guleun ppalgaeji go kkoch gileul kkala jun bileul hajyo geu jali geu goseseo nal gidaryeo yo
